text:
@realDonaldTrump 12,469 Americans dies from H1N1.
31,628 Americans are now dead from the Coronavirus.

What do you call your #PresidentialDisaster?
#WhereAreTheTests you promised us on March 13? https://t.co/5MMIko5pxk
